title: Wholesale Fruits Warehouse
description: A web application for products warehouse management where users can manage products inventory likes add, delivered, restock and delete items.

title: Online Study Platform
description: A web application for online study platform where users can learn online courses and can also manage their own courses.

title: Juice Bar Shop Site
description: A web application for juice bar shop where users can order their favorite juice and can also obtain relevant information about store and products.
